lead_paragraph: Before summer ends, Revel, Trump Plaza, the Showboat and the Atlantic Club will be shuttered ex-casinos, leaving Atlantic City officials looking for a way to avoid having dark, empty shells on its signature Boardwalk.

headline.main: Atlantic City Fears Closing Casinos May Be Eyesore
headline.print_headline: Atlantic City Fears Closing Casinos May Be Eyesore
